column1: Little Goat Diner////This is just another mediocre restaurant coasting on the celebrity of its owner. I live in the neighborhood and have been to Little Goat maybe a dozen times over the past few years. Tonight was my most recent visit and will likely be my last. The restaurant was FREEZING
column2: we were rushed to order (despite the restaurant being half full) and the food was not that good. I've never had a meal at Little Goat that I thought was better than average. If you care at all about what you are eating
column3: there are a 20 places within walking distance that are better than Little Goat. The only reason to go here is that kids love this place. When my kid starts paying for dinner
